post.title: Membership and Contest Hoodies
post.description:
Hello Band Families,
It's time to order your Contest Hoodies and Pins! Please fill out the attached
post.content:
Hello Band Families,

It's time to order your Contest Hoodies and Pins! Please fill out the attached form and turn it in with payment to the White Band Box. Hoodies and pins will be delivered at 6-9 practice on September 28th. If you have not turned in your Membership form, please do so ASAP. Membership items will start being delivered at 6-9 practice starting next Wednesday or the next Band Booster meeting on Monday, August 29th. Any questions, please contact Shirley Berish (440)717-1532.

2016 Contest Hoodies and Pin Order Form

NR Band Booster Yard Sign Order Form

Band Booster Membership
